channel.title: Fixing Combat
channel.description:
For some reason our combat isnt working... We are using:
Spectral's world Fallen Pkers Client V3
Has anyone had this error? And is there anyway to fix this? [i][b]I may give out the client download link to people who i can trust, or seem happy to help us.[/b][/i]
